name: hyperliquid-mcp-server
description: Complete MCP server for Hyperliquid DEX - trading, account management, market data, and WebSocket subscriptions
author: Caio Vicentino

tools.name: hl_place_order
tools.description: Place a limit or market order on Hyperliquid

tools.name: hl_cancel_order
tools.description: Cancel a specific open order by order ID

tools.name: hl_cancel_all_orders
tools.description: Cancel all open orders for a specific coin or all coins

tools.name: hl_modify_order
tools.description: Modify an existing order's price and/or size

tools.name: hl_batch_orders
tools.description: Place multiple orders in a single transaction

tools.name: hl_close_position
tools.description: Close an open position (market order at current price)

tools.name: hl_set_leverage
tools.description: Set leverage for a specific trading pair

tools.name: hl_get_positions
tools.description: Get all current open positions with PnL information

tools.name: hl_get_open_orders
tools.description: Get all currently open orders

tools.name: hl_get_account_balance
tools.description: Get account balance and margin information

tools.name: hl_get_user_fills
tools.description: Get historical trade fills for the account

tools.name: hl_get_funding_history
tools.description: Get funding payment history for perpetual positions

tools.name: hl_get_user_funding_rate
tools.description: Get current funding rates for user's positions

tools.name: hl_get_margin_summary
tools.description: Get detailed margin and account value summary

tools.name: hl_update_isolated_margin
tools.description: Update isolated margin for a specific position

tools.name: hl_get_order_status
tools.description: Get detailed status of a specific order

tools.name: hl_get_market_prices
tools.description: Get current market prices for all or specific trading pairs

tools.name: hl_get_orderbook
tools.description: Get real-time order book for a trading pair

tools.name: hl_get_candles
tools.description: Get historical candlestick (OHLCV) data

tools.name: hl_get_recent_trades
tools.description: Get recent market trades for a trading pair

tools.name: hl_get_funding_rates
tools.description: Get current and predicted funding rates for all pairs

tools.name: hl_get_market_metadata
tools.description: Get market configuration and trading pair information

tools.name: hl_subscribe_orderbook
tools.description: Subscribe to real-time order book updates via WebSocket

tools.name: hl_subscribe_trades
tools.description: Subscribe to real-time trade updates via WebSocket

tools.name: hl_subscribe_user_events
tools.description: Subscribe to user-specific events (fills, order updates) via WebSocket

tools.name: hl_unsubscribe_all
tools.description: Unsubscribe from all active WebSocket subscriptions

tools.name: hl_get_24h_stats
tools.description: Get 24-hour trading statistics for markets

tools.name: hl_get_liquidations
tools.description: Get recent liquidation events
